name: Null Directive
description:
Overview

Null Directive is an Narrative Sci-Fi First Person Shooter made in Unreal Engine 4 with a team of 3 artists and 1 programmer over a period of 12 weeks as a UCF Game Design Senior Capstone.

The player journeys through the Sintere Labs Facility, assisted over radio by an old Sintere Lab Tech looking to get information and people out of the abandoned facility. Search for an escape from this would-be high tech tomb while fighting off androids in this ambient shooter.

Instructions

Download and Unzip NullDirective.zip
Double click .exe to open
Esc to Pause/Control Info (Supports PC and XBOX Controller)
WASD to Move
0 (Zero) to Exit to Desktop

Credits

Yasiman Ahasani - Technical and 3D Art - Website
Gabriel Ramos - 2D/3D Concept and 3D Character Art - Website
Melissa Scharf - Weapon and Environmental 3D Art - Website
